severity_descriptions.0: No signs of osteoarthritis. The knee joint appears healthy with normal cartilage space.
severity_descriptions.1: Doubtful narrowing of joint space with possible osteophytic lipping. Very early signs that may or may not indicate OA.
severity_descriptions.2: Definite osteophytes and possible narrowing of joint space. Mild osteoarthritis is present.
severity_descriptions.3: Moderate multiple osteophytes, definite narrowing of joint space, some sclerosis. Moderate OA requiring attention.
severity_descriptions.4: Large osteophytes, marked narrowing of joint space, severe sclerosis and definite deformity. Severe OA - medical intervention needed.
